alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 12:21AM CDT until May 31 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Buffalo County in south central Nebraska... Southeastern Sherman County in central Nebraska... * Until 1245 AM CDT. * At 1221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ravenna, or 27 miles north of Kearney, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Rockville around 1240 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
